attributes.action: change stamp duty to increase the thresholds for all property types and introduce a sliding scale
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current threshold for stamp duty is outdated and does not reflect the current housing market. This petition is to increase the threshold for all property types and then introduce a sliding scale system for the amount of stamp duty to be paid. This will ease the financial burden of buying a property for first time buyers, those on low incomes who wish to enter the housing market and those who wish to move up the housing ladder.
